dcterms:description: The DiCOVA dataset consists of breathing, cough, and speech labeled data used for COVID-19 diagnosis through acoustic signals. It includes a total of 965 samples, with 172 negative and 793 positive samples, recorded from volunteers.
dcterms:title: DiCOVA dataset

dcterms:description: The Coswara dataset is a collection of breathing, cough, and voice sounds aimed at aiding COVID-19 diagnosis. It was collected from volunteers and includes various audio samples.
dcterms:title: Coswara dataset
